original: intros m x y z i Hinv Hexd. unfold expf. simpl. split. - destruct (inv_hmap m) as [Hinv1 Hprec]. apply Hinv. - unfold expf in *. intros [Hinv' [Hexpo1 Hexpo2]] [Hexpf1 Hexpf2]. apply expf_symm in Hexpo1. apply expf_trans with (t := cA_1 m one x). + apply between_expf_L0_1 with (i0 := i). * apply Hinv. * unfold x_1 in *. apply Hexpo1. + apply expf_trans with (t := Iter (cF m) i z). * apply expf_symm in Hexpo1. apply Hexpo1. * apply Hexpf1.
